entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Entry Control Font Stability #16743
  • [Android / 8.0.0-preview 6] SwipeView's data binding doesn't work while using it inside a CollectionView #16742
  • ClickGestureRecognizer is not functional #16739
  • Title colour on Android Picker, initially appears grey. #16737
  • UseMauiMaps doesn't work if called before ConfigureFonts #16736
  • SwipeView crash inside container in CollectionView DataTemplate on Windows #16735
  • iOS/Mac Catalyst image localization #16734
  • [Bug] [WebAuthenticator] [iOS] Native iOS crash when completing authentication in a separate browser app #16733
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on physical device IPhone 13 - iOS version 16.5.1 #16731

Closed

  • Using `Tab` in a `FlyoutItem` cuts off underlying `ContentPage` #9381
  • NavigationPageRenderer is broken in .net7 #10397
    Backlog
  • Publishing a Maui Windows app SelfContained=false doesn't run #7170
    Backlog
  • FilePicker: A device attached to the system is not functioning. (0x8007001F) #13207
    Backlog
  • .NET 8 MAUI.Blazor keyboard event doesn't work anymore #16730
  • SecureStorage exception on Android device #16493

PullRequests

Created

  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
  • Document Brush & Colors #16738
    area/docs 📓
  • Add a "VSCode" target to open the "maui.code-workspace". #16732

Merged

  • Make Android visual test screenshots more deterministic #16591
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in WindowOverlay #16700
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Enable default xcode path #16708

Updated

  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [UITest] Add more logging and restart in setup #16687
    area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Picker #16685
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [net7.0] Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16692
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, Under Consideration
  • Wrong scroll with shell and entry and safe area #16339
  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Document IElementHandler #16706
    area/docs 📓
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16690
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
